975c33d6c365059c227f66369d264830.name: SalesOrder2SalesOrder

37247bed69140cef25a6eeb241753653.description: Convert a Contact into an Account

b674416ea34e0a752c6cc88b18de0145.author: Luke majorlabel.nl

bf9cdf3cc288cef021d4787827427125.name: PurchaseOrder_FieldDependency

a3df75ecbda7aabad282685929078b45.name: Convert Country field to picklist
a3df75ecbda7aabad282685929078b45.description: This change will convert country fields on Accounts, Contacts, Vendors, Leads and Inventory modules into shared picklists.

e0e4593c729f937e8eaac0619f59d4bb.name: Convert State field to picklist

e0e4593c729f937e8eaac0619f59d4bb.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

a8adcf692fa926fbb99ec90a190b5b8f.name: Select User for Calendar Follow up

a8adcf692fa926fbb99ec90a190b5b8f.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

1d423964124bfb1284851734767a0e3a.name: Separate Account and Contact field on Payments

b3fde0d8459a905a09e297e59f32dfaa.name: Separate RelatedTo field on HelpDesk

b3fde0d8459a905a09e297e59f32dfaa.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

42cfebf951f8498092ac0e950ee67b1e.name: Separate RelatedTo field on Potentials

eb8d875c5adb2f6e683aef2bfe077fa9.name: Separate RelatedTo field on Projects

747b42fa1e7512db806ad58fa0896642.name: GenDoc: Advanced OpenOffice Merge.
747b42fa1e7512db806ad58fa0896642.description: This extension permits creating advanced templates using OpenOffice or Libre Office which can easily be merged with fields in the coreBOS application and then converted to PDF or used as working documents in the word processor.
747b42fa1e7512db806ad58fa0896642.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.
